items.sentence: It may not have been as easy as Tom said it was.
It might not be as easy as you think to do that.
What would happen if we don\'t do what they ask?
Tom cringed when he saw Mary walk into the room.
Tom cut a hole in the fence and crawled through.
Tom said he was sorry that he couldn\'t help me.
Tom said he wasn\'t going to Boston next summer.
The game has been postponed because of the rain.
Mary tried the skirt on, but it didn\'t fit her.
Tom looked at his watch to see what time it was.
